title: The Song of Deliverance
summary: Exodus 15 contains the song of Moses and the Israelites, praising God for their deliverance at the Red Sea. The chapter also tells of bitter water made sweet at Marah and God’s promise of healing for obedience.

faq.question: What is the Song of Moses about?
faq.answer: It celebrates God’s power in defeating Egypt and saving Israel.

faq.question: What did God do at Marah?
faq.answer: He made the bitter water drinkable and revealed Himself as their healer.
